description: This file is the entry point for a React front-end application. It imports React, ReactDOM, CSS styles, and the main App component, then renders the App component into the DOM element with id 'root' inside a React.StrictMode wrapper.

methods.name: ReactDOM.createRoot
methods.description: Creates a React root rendering container for managing the React component tree.

methods.name: root.render
methods.description: Renders the React elements into the DOM within the created root.
